4305930.name: Salmon City Preview
4305930.description:
Make Money, or Die Trying.

Welcome to Salmon City, a chaotic roleplaying experience where every round is a fresh start. You arrive as a stranger with their own name, their own skills and their own set of objectives that you must accomplish by any means necessary. 

Deals and Decisions.

Make an honest living selling burgers, commit crimes, gamble at the casino, commit crimes, uphold the law, commit crimes, save lives, commit crimes, mug people, commit crimes, cook drugs, commit crimes, commit crimes, commit crimes - the choice is yours.

Most objectives can't be completed alone. On the streets of Salmon City, you will have to make deals with strangers, form alliances and betray someone before they betray you. 

Every Round is Different.

Rounds are short and fast-paced. When they end, you start all over again. This means a new character, new goals, new decisions to make.

Tell Your Own Story.

Salmon City isn't about who wins in the end, it's about what happens along the way. The best moments are the random unscripted ones you laugh about at the end.

The Reward of Good Karma.

Salmon City uses a karma system to ensure fair and responsible play. Completing your objectives and playing responsibly earns more interesting objectives and roles in future rounds. Treat it like a deathmatch game and the city will remember.

Features:

  • Emergent social gameplay with proximity voice chat

  • Short, fast-paced rounds

  • Player-driven economy and jobs

  • Trading, crafting and cooking

  • Law enforcement and crime

  • Loud and frantic shootouts

  • Driveable vehicles
4305930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
